user.title: Västtrafik M34 Setup
user.description: Enter your Authentication Key from [developer.vasttrafik.se]({auth_key_url}). Find it in your application under 'Autentiseringsnyckel' (base64 encoded client_id:client_secret).

data_description.auth_key: The base64-encoded authentication key from your Västtrafik developer application. It combines your client_id and client_secret.

station.title: Search for Station
station.description: Search for your stop/station. Partial names work - try 'Central', 'Brunnsparken', or any part of the name.

data_description.station_name: Enter part of the station name (e.g., 'Central' finds 'Centralstationen')

select_station.title: Select Station
select_station.description: Select your station from the search results below.

data_description.station: Choose the station you want to monitor for departures.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Västtrafik API. Check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication key. Verify you copied the full key from developer.vasttrafik.se.
error.no_stations_found: No stations found. Try a different search term or check spelling.
error.invalid_station: Invalid station selected. Please try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This station is already configured. Choose a different station or remove the existing one first.
